header.author: Claudius Amyand
header.title: Of an Obstruction of the Biliary Ducts, and an Impostumation of the Gall-Bladder, Discharging Upwards of 18 Quarts of Bilious Matter in 25 Days, without Any Apparent Defect in the Animal Functions. By Claudius Amyand, Esq; Serjeant Surgeon to His Majesty, and F. R. S.
